title: Robert De Niro's true character has been revealed – and he's no Goodfella
text:
Robert De Niro is at it again, dropping f-bombs. And don’t we love it? De Niro’s recent “f___ em” diatribe on CNN – he delivered a payload of expletives when quizzed about his criticisms of Donald Trump – has seen the actor hailed as a champion of truth, decency, democracy, free cupcakes and all that is just in the world.

That despite the fact his rancorous sit-down with Brian Stelter was going out at 11.47 am, when many unsuspecting families were tuning in.

The swooning was no less deafening following his appearance at the 2018 Tony Awards. "I'm just going to say one thing," he declared from the podium. "F___ Trump!" The applause was thunderous – as was the sound of social media hugging itself...
description: Robert De Niro is at it again, dropping f-bombs.
